data.message: I'm playing the ShadyWars too! It's an amazing game, congrats! 😙👏🎉I've finished all the free levels and I'm going to buy the next cause it's my fave game! 😄😉

replies.message:
That's the whole point...  $$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$ bleed the fans dry...   cds. .  $
Piss poor quality clothing $
The cds you've already got but on vinyl  $$
And now a game $$$$
What next?  Shady hot dogs..
Shady oven gloves...
Shady pooper scooper?? 
Doesn't matter what shit he brings out some muppet is gonna pay 10x what it's actually worth cos it's got his brand on it.... 
Used to respect this guy for his music..  now he is just another celebrity sell out.    
Shame.
